mapper.select: select u.username, u.name, u.department, er.evaluate_type, er.evaluator from evaluate_relations as er left join user as u on u.id = er.evaluator where er.evaluated_user = #{userId} and er.enable = 1

select u.username, u.name, u.department, er.evaluate_type, er.evaluated_user from evaluate_relations as er left join user as u on u.id = er.evaluated_user where er.evaluator = #{userId} and er.enable = 1

select u.username, u.name, u.department, er.evaluate_type, er.evaluated_user from evaluate_relations as er left join user as u on u.id = er.evaluated_user where er.evaluator = #{userId} and er.enable = 1 and er.evaluate_type = 0
select evaluate_step, start_date, end_date, description, enable from evaluation_process where epoch = #{epoch} ORDER BY evaluate_step
SELECT id, name, department, work_num FROM user where is_delete = 0 ORDER BY CASE WHEN department = #{department} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, department ASC
SELECT evaluate_step FROM evaluation_process where enable = 1 ORDER BY epoch DESC limit 1
SELECT end_date FROM evaluation_process where epoch = #{epoch} and evaluate_step = 2
SELECT evaluate_step, end_date, epoch FROM evaluation_process where enable = 1 ORDER BY epoch DESC limit 1
select meanings, principles, opening_remarks, title from evaluate_table
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evaluation_process (evaluate_step, epoch, end_date, start_date, description, enable, extra) VALUES (#{evaluateProcess.evaluateStep}, #{evaluateProcess.epoch}, #{evaluateProcess.endDate}, #{evaluateProcess.startDate}, #{evaluateProcess.description}, #{evaluateProcess.enable}, #{evaluateProcess.extra})

INSERT INTO average_sum (dimension_id, average_score, weight, type, epoch, content) VALUES (#{averageSum.dimensionId}, #{averageSum.averageScore}, #{averageSum.weight}, #{averageSum.type}, #{averageSum.epoch}, #{averageSum.content})
INSERT INTO scores (dimension_id, score, todo_id, weight, description) VALUES (#{score.dimensionId}, #{score.score}, #{score.todoId}, #{score.weight}, #{score.description})
mapper.update: UPDATE evaluate_table SET meanings = #{evaluateTable.meanings}, principles = #{evaluateTable.principles}, opening_remarks = #{evaluateTable.openingRemarks}, title = #{evaluateTable.title}
mapper.delete: delete from average_sum where epoch = #{epoch} and type = #{type} and content = #{content}
